Dragonfly::

Dragonfly was wounded, but instead beg mercy he shot 25 times against 
Hot rod's chest.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> When he tackled Dragonfly he pressed right against him, and 
grabbed. He
> was now to close for the punches. They would only be able to punch 
his
> back and maybe arm. Hot Rod stuck his saw blade right into where
> Dragonfly's Spark would be.
> 
> OOC: Since Hot Rod was pressed right up against Dragonfly, it is 
legal
> for me to post for Hot Rod actually doing that damage.
